attributes.action: regulate biodegradable bags and packaging in supermarkets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please pass a bill on plastic packaging.
Although this is is against the lobbying will of Oil Companies and may I say your Advisors;It would be a vote winner in the eyes of the voting public.They are primed and ready for action.In one foul stroke it would educate the opposition;leaving them with a shaky platform;and would put your goodself in an implacable position;with a head start on the Green Party.
Thanking you in advance.
Paul Coxon Esq.
